Text:
NetScream Info:

NetScream is a tool for all that allows you to modify your modem settings to increase internet performance up to 200% or higher!! No modifications to your hardware are made and all adjustments and settings are done in an easy to use interface that a child could use. Most 'other' modem enhancers promise that they work while you notice no difference at all in internet speed.

System Requirements: Pentium 90+ Mhz or Compatible - Microsoft operating system: Windows 9x/ME/NT/2000/XP/2003.

What's new: Added tweaks for Windows XP and cable modems which increases buffer sizes for downloads.
